long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Dark Mode Wizard Extension is a simple and efficient tool that enables users to switch any website to dark mode with a single click. 

It is designed to improve browsing comfort during the night or in low-light environments. With easy on/off functionality, you can quickly toggle dark mode to reduce eye strain and enjoy a more comfortable viewing experience.

Features:

a. Toggle dark mode on any website with a single click.

b. Lightweight and user-friendly interface.

c. No complex settings or configurations required.
